org.vaniglia.templateengine
Class TemplateEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.vaniglia.templateengine.TemplateEngine
public class TemplateEngine
extends java.lang.Object

The TemplateEngine is a very simple and fast template engine. It can't be compared to other solutions like Velocity that are by very far more complete. This template engine can only be used for references (variables) substitution in a template.
